channel.title: CVE Feed for FireEye -- FireEye EX
channel.description: The latest CVEs for FireEye -- FireEye EX

item.title: CVE-2024-0317|2024-01-15T16:26:28.983Z -- FireEye -- FireEye EX
item.description: Cross-Site Scripting in FireEye EX, affecting version 9.0.3.936727. Exploitation of this vulnerability allows an attacker to send a specially crafted JavaScript payload via the 'type' and 's_f_name' parameters to an authenticated user to retrieve their session details.
